statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 10 \\ -18 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
